sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Voya Investment Management LLC Has $19.78 Million Holdings in Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Voya Investment Management LLC significantly reduced its stake in Genius Sports Limited ($GENI) by 47.9% in Q3, now holding 1,597,656 shares valued at $19.78 million. Despite missing EPS estimates, Genius Sports reported revenue that beat expectations and maintains a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts with a $15.05 price target. The company currently trades around $10.80, facing negative net margin and return on equity.

feed.title: Channel Wealth LLC Acquires 321,214 Shares of Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Channel Wealth LLC significantly increased its stake in Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) in Q3 by acquiring 321,214 additional shares, bringing its total holdings to 356,418 shares valued at $4.41 million. Despite a Q3 EPS miss, the company's revenue exceeded expectations, and analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" consensus with an average price target of $15.05. Institutional investors and hedge funds collectively own approximately 81.9% of Genius Sports stock.

feed.title: Genius Sports stock rating reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens
feed.summary: Citizens reiterated its Market Outperform rating on Genius Sports Ltd. (NYSE:GENI) with a $17.00 price target, despite regulatory scrutiny affecting prediction market offerings in Arizona. The firm believes direct regulatory action against Genius Sports is unlikely, as it primarily sells data to market makers rather than operating prediction markets itself. Citizens also maintained a Market Outperform rating for Sportradar (SRAD) with a $36 price target, acknowledging similar indirect exposure to the regulatory situation for both companies.

feed.title: Nomura Holdings Inc. Makes New $5.20 Million Investment in Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Nomura Holdings Inc. has invested $5.20 million in Genius Sports Limited, acquiring 500,000 shares in the 2nd quarter of 2025. This move is part of a broader institutional trend, with other major firms like Geode Capital Management and Wellington Management Group also increasing their stakes, bringing institutional ownership to 81.91%. Despite the company remaining unprofitable with a Q2 EPS miss, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with a consensus target price of $15.05.

feed.title: Genius Sports stock rating reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens
feed.summary: Citizens, an analyst firm, has reiterated its Market Outperform rating on Genius Sports Ltd. (NYSE:GENI) with a $17.00 price target, despite regulatory concerns in Arizona regarding prediction market offerings. While regulatory action against companies like Fanatics and PrizePicks is possible, Citizens believes direct action against Genius Sports is highly unlikely as it primarily sells data to market makers. The firm also maintained a Market Outperform rating for Sportradar (SRAD) with a $36 price target, acknowledging its similar indirect exposure to the regulatory situation.

feed.title: Genius Sports unveils aggressive targets at Investor Day event featuring the NFL Commissioner
feed.summary: Genius Sports presented ambitious financial targets at its Investor Day, highlighted by an appearance from NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell. The company aims for $1.5 billion in adjusted EBITDA by 2029 and $700 million by 2026, demonstrating strong projected growth in its sports data technology and betting partnerships. Goodell's presence underscores the strategic importance of the NFL's data rights partnership with Genius Sports.

feed.title: Genius Sports (GENI) Valuation Revisited After FanDuel Content Partnership and New 2028 Revenue Target
feed.summary: Genius Sports (GENI) has set an ambitious 2028 revenue goal of $1.2 billion and enhanced its U.S. presence through a partnership with FanDuel Sports Network. Despite recent stock choppiness, its 200.28% 3-year return indicates strong long-term momentum. The stock is considered 30.4% undervalued by analysts, projecting a fair value of $15.32, though potential regulatory uncertainty and competition pose risks.

feed.title: 140,000 Shares in Genius Sports Limited $GENI Purchased by Lonestar Capital Management LLC
feed.summary: Lonestar Capital Management LLC recently purchased 140,000 shares of Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) for approximately $1.456 million, making it their 16th largest holding. Genius Sports reported an EPS loss of ($0.11), missing estimates, but exceeded revenue expectations at $166.28 million, despite negative net margin and return on equity. Analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average price target of $15.05.

feed.title: Nikko Asset Management Americas Inc. Sells 1,390,782 Shares of Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Nikko Asset Management Americas Inc. decreased its stake in Genius Sports Limited by 24.4% in the second quarter, selling over 1.39 million shares. The firm now holds approximately 2.00% of the company, valued at $44.8 million. Genius Sports (NYSE:GENI) recently missed EPS estimates but beat revenue expectations, and analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average target price of $15.05.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited Approves Key Resolutions at 2025 AGM
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited (GENI) held its 2025 Annual General Meeting on December 10, 2025, where shareholders approved key resolutions, including the re-appointment of directors and auditors, and authorization for share repurchases. The high shareholder participation (78.4% of voting share capital) signals strong engagement. While the company shows promising revenue growth and improved cash flow, profitability remains a challenge, and technical indicators suggest a bearish trend.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited $GENI is Ophir Asset Management Pty Ltd's 3rd Largest Position
feed.summary: Ophir Asset Management Pty Ltd significantly reduced its stake in Genius Sports Limited ($GENI) by 23.8% in Q2, but it still represents their third-largest position at 5.8% of their portfolio. Genius Sports missed earnings per share estimates but beat revenue expectations, maintaining unprofitability. Analysts currently rate GENI as a "Moderate Buy" with a consensus target price of $15.05.

feed.title: Global Alpha Capital Adds Another $15 Million to Its 7th-Largest Position: Genius Sports
feed.summary: Global Alpha Capital Management Ltd. has significantly increased its stake in Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) by 537,900 shares, adding an estimated $15.05 million to its portfolio. This transaction makes Genius Sports the fund's seventh-largest holding, representing 3.35% of its assets under management. Despite not yet being profitable, Genius Sports is highlighted as a promising growth stock in the sports betting technology sector due to its strong revenue growth and extensive partnerships.

feed.title: Divisadero Street Capital Management LP Sells 4,133,652 Shares of Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Divisadero Street Capital Management LP significantly reduced its stake in Genius Sports Limited ($GENI) by selling 4,133,652 shares, retaining only 166,985 shares. Despite this sell-off by one institution, other major institutional investors like Invesco, Global Alpha, Manulife, Geode, and Millennium Management increased their positions in Genius Sports, bringing institutional ownership to approximately 81.9%. Genius Sports reported revenues above expectations at $166.3M but missed on EPS at ($0.11), with analysts maintaining a "Moderate Buy" rating and a consensus target price of $14.90.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited $GENI Position Boosted by Hood River Capital Management LLC
feed.summary: Hood River Capital Management LLC increased its stake in Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) by 3.3% in Q2, boosting its holdings to 6,811,333 shares worth $70.8 million. Other institutional investors like Wellington Management Group and Voss Capital also increased their positions, bringing total institutional ownership to 81.91%. Despite the stock having a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating and an average price target of $14.90, the company recently missed EPS estimates in its latest earnings report.

feed.title: Benchmark reiterates Buy rating on Genius Sports stock, maintains $16 target
feed.summary: Benchmark maintained its Buy rating and $16 price target on Genius Sports Ltd. (NYSE: GENI) after the company's Analyst Day presentation, which provided 2028 guidance exceeding consensus expectations. The firm highlighted expanding opportunities in premium advertising and fan engagement, alongside the deepened partnership with the NFL. Other analysts like Guggenheim and Citizens also raised their price targets, while UBS lowered its target due to cash flow concerns.

feed.title: Benchmark Reiterates Buy Rating on Genius Sports Ltd. (GENI) Following Strong 2028 Guidance
feed.summary: Benchmark analyst Mike Hickey reiterated a Buy rating and a $16.00 price target for Genius Sports Ltd. (NYSE: GENI). This reiteration follows strong guidance for 2028, indicating a positive outlook for the company's future performance. The full details of the analyst's commentary are available to premium subscribers.

feed.title: Rhumbline Advisers Purchases New Shares in Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Rhumbline Advisers has acquired a new stake of 303,088 shares in Genius Sports (NYSE:GENI) valued at approximately $3.15 million. This purchase represents about 0.14% of the company, and comes amidst a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts with an average target price of $14.90, despite the company reporting mixed quarterly fundamentals.

feed.title: Genius Sports (GENI) Valuation Check After 2028 Roadmap, New Partnerships and Analyst Upgrades
feed.summary: Genius Sports (GENI) has unveiled an ambitious 2028 roadmap, focusing on becoming a core infrastructure provider for data-driven sports media, betting, and advertising, backed by new partnerships with FanDuel, Publicis Sports, and Brazil’s CBF. The company's stock has seen significant momentum, showing a 27.41% year-to-date return and a 141.20% three-year total shareholder return. Analysts have lifted targets, and the stock is currently trading at a substantial discount, raising questions about whether it's an undervalued compounder or if optimism is already priced in.

feed.title: Cooper Creek Partners Management LLC Increases Holdings in Genius Sports Limited $GENI
feed.summary: Cooper Creek Partners Management LLC increased its stake in Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) by 9.6% in the second quarter, bringing its total holdings to 9,191,865 shares, representing 4.27% of the company. Other institutional investors like Invesco Ltd. and Loomis Sayles & Co. L P also significantly increased their positions. Genius Sports, with a market capitalization of $2.33 billion, recently missed EPS estimates but beat revenue expectations, and currently holds an average analyst rating of "Moderate Buy" with a $14.90 target price.

feed.title: Genius Sports (GENI) Shares Surge On Bullish 2028 Outlook
feed.summary: Genius Sports (GENI) shares are trading higher after the company unveiled an optimistic 2028 financial outlook projecting $1.2 billion in group revenue and $365 million in adjusted EBITDA. This positive forecast, along with a new strategic partnership with FanDuel Sports Network, has driven investor confidence and a significant surge in stock price. The collaboration will launch an "Intelligent Content Platform" for NBA and WNBA broadcasts, leveraging the GeniusIQ platform for real-time advertising and game insights.

feed.title: Genius Sports Joins Forces with FanDuel Sports Network to Launch AI and Sports Data Platform Across NBA and WNBA
feed.summary: Genius Sports has partnered with FanDuel Sports Network to introduce an AI and sports data platform for the NBA and WNBA. This collaboration provides brands with a nationwide intelligent content platform to engage U.S. sports fans, leveraging GeniusIQ to transform live broadcasts into dynamic, brand-ready canvases. The initiative aims to create new sponsorship opportunities and enhance fan engagement through real-time, data-driven insights and augmented advertising.

feed.title: Genius Sports (GENI) Soars 12% as Firm Bares 2028 Growth Targets
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) saw its stock surge by 11.97% after unveiling ambitious financial growth targets for 2028 during its Investor Day. The company aims for $1.2 billion in revenues, $365 million in adjusted EBITDA, and $220 million in free cash flow over the next three years. Despite reporting a net loss in Q3, Genius Sports demonstrated strong revenue growth, primarily driven by media and betting revenues, and raised its full-year 2025 guidance.

feed.title: Genius Sports: Rapid Developments, Big Potential
feed.summary: Genius Sports (GENI) stock has risen by 12.81% following strategic partnerships, including deals with FanDuel Sports Network for an Intelligent Content Platform and the Brazilian Football Confederation for semi-automated offside technology. These collaborations aim to enhance data services, fan engagement, and officiating accuracy, driving market confidence despite noted financial challenges like a negative profit margin and leverage ratio. Investors are cautiously optimistic about Genius Sports' future growth trajectory and market influence.

feed.title: Genius Sports to Detail Technology Advantage, Growth Strategy, and 2028 Financial Targets at its Investor Day
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited is holding an Investor Day to outline its technology advantage, growth strategy, and ambitious financial targets for 2028. The company aims to achieve $1.2 billion in Group Revenue, $365 million in Group Adjusted EBITDA, and $220 million in Free Cash Flow, driven by its GeniusIQ platform and diversified revenue streams. CEO Mark Locke and CFO Bryan Castellani expressed confidence in these targets, emphasizing their foundation in proven growth and margin progress, as well as predictable long-term contracts.

feed.title: Genius Sports unveils aggressive targets at Investor Day event featuring the NFL Commissioner
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited is hosting an Investor Day event to present its 2028 financial outlook. The sports data company has disclosed its 2028 group targets in advance of the management presentations. This event is significant for investors looking at the future growth trajectory of GENI.

feed.title: Genius Sports joins forces with FanDuel Sports Network to launch its Intelligent Content Platform across the NBA and WNBA | News
feed.summary: Genius Sports has partnered with FanDuel Sports Network to integrate its Intelligent Content Platform for NBA and WNBA coverage. This collaboration aims to enhance the fan experience by leveraging advanced content solutions across both basketball leagues. The platform will deliver innovative features to engage audiences.

feed.title: Genius Sports Partners with Publicis Sports to Reimagine Future of Fan Engagement
feed.summary: Genius Sports has announced a partnership with Publicis Sports to reimagine the future of fan engagement. This collaboration aims to leverage their combined expertise to innovate how sports audiences interact with content and sports experiences. The article also lists other recent partnerships and acquisitions made by Genius Sports to bolster its fan activation and advertising platforms.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) Shares Slammed 26% But Getting In Cheap Might Be Difficult Regardless
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) experienced a significant 26% share price drop in the last month, bringing its annual return down to -3.6%. Despite this decline, the company's 3.5x Price-to-Sales (P/S) ratio remains high compared to the Hospitality industry average of 1.6x, driven by strong past revenue growth and an expected 18% annual growth forecast for the next three years, outpacing the industry's 14% forecast. This high valuation suggests investors are confident in its future prospects, even though the recent share price drop might indicate otherwise.

feed.title: Genius Sports partners with MEDIAPRO to deploy semi-automated offside technology across CONMEBOL’s Copa Sudamericana and Copa Libertadores Finals | News
feed.summary: Genius Sports has partnered with MEDIAPRO to implement semi-automated offside technology for CONMEBOL's Copa Sudamericana and Copa Libertadores Finals. This collaboration aims to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of offside decisions in these major football competitions. The deployment signifies a step forward in integrating advanced technology into high-profile sports events.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited Just Reported A Surprise Loss: Here's What Analysts Think Will Happen Next
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited recently reported a surprise quarterly loss, causing its shares to drop 8.8%. Despite a revenue beat, statutory earnings per share were a loss of US$0.11, falling short of analyst expectations for a profit. Analysts have since revised their 2026 EPS forecasts downwards, although their price target for the company remains stable at US$15.00, anticipating Genius Sports to continue outgrowing the broader industry in revenue.

feed.title: Genius Sports Announces Pricing of Public Offering
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited announced the pricing of an underwritten public offering of 17,647,059 ordinary shares at $8.50 per share, expecting to raise approximately $144 million in net proceeds. The offering is anticipated to close on January 16, 2025, with proceeds intended for general corporate purposes, including potential acquisitions. The offering saw participation from existing shareholders Caledonia and Wellington Management, as well as new investors, with BTIG acting as lead book-running manager.

feed.title: Genius Sports stock rating reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens By Investing.com - Investing.com Australia
feed.summary: Citizens has reaffirmed its Market Outperform rating on Genius Sports Ltd. (NYSE:GENI) with a $15.00 price target, citing the company's ability to monetize sports rights and an anticipated positive shift in cash flow. This positive outlook follows other strategic developments for Genius Sports, including the acquisition of Sports Innovation Lab, the appointment of a new CFO, and positive analyst coverage from Benchmark and Roth/MKM. The company is also planning an auditor change to KPMG in 2026.

feed.title: Genius Sports stock rating reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens - Investing.com
feed.summary: This article reports that Genius Sports' stock rating has been reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens. As such, specific financial details or further analyst commentary are not available.

feed.title: Genius Sports stock rating reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens - Investing.com Nigeria
feed.summary: This article reports that Genius Sports' stock rating has been reiterated at Market Outperform by Citizens. The content primarily shows an application error, preventing further details from being displayed.

feed.title: Genius Sports to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Results on November 4 - Yahoo Finance
feed.summary: Genius Sports has announced that it will release its third-quarter 2025 financial results on November 4, 2025. The company will also host a conference call on the same day to discuss these results. Genius Sports, a global sports data and technology company, provides services to over 700 sports organizations and partners worldwide, including major leagues and betting operators.

feed.title: Genius Sports (NYSE:GENI) NYSE Composite Shapes Sports Media
feed.summary: Genius Sports (NYSE:GENI) is noted for strengthening the NYSE Composite through its innovative use of sports data technology. The company enhances sports integrity, media solutions, and real-time data distribution for various stakeholders including leagues, broadcasters, and betting operators.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited $GENI Shares Acquired by Wilson Asset Management International PTY Ltd. - MarketBeat
feed.summary: Wilson Asset Management International PTY Ltd. increased its stake in Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) by 5.0% during the second quarter, owning 882,691 shares valued at approximately $9.18 million. Other institutional investors also adjusted their holdings. Wall Street analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating for Genius Sports, with price targets ranging from $13.00 to $16.00, and the company reported its quarterly earnings data recently.

feed.title: Genius Sports Ltd. Experiences Revision in Stock Evaluation Amid Market Dynamics - Markets Mojo
feed.summary: Genius Sports Ltd., a small-cap software company, has seen its stock evaluation revised due to current market dynamics. The company has demonstrated strong performance over the past year with a 58.26% return, outperforming the S&P 500, despite recent stock price fluctuations. Technical indicators show a mixed picture with a mildly bearish MACD weekly, bullish MACD monthly, and mildly bullish Bollinger Bands and moving averages.

feed.title: Benchmark reiterates Buy rating on Genius Sports stock after acquisition
feed.summary: Benchmark has reiterated a Buy rating and a $16.00 price target on Genius Sports Ltd. following its acquisition of Sports Innovation Lab. The acquisition is expected to strengthen Genius Sports' FANHub with purchase-driven targeting capabilities and expand cross-sell opportunities. The company's stock has shown strong momentum, delivering a 62.72% return over the past year.

feed.title: Genius Sports acquires Sports Innovation Lab to bolster world’s most advanced fan activation platform
feed.summary: Genius Sports has acquired Sports Innovation Lab to enhance its fan activation platform. This acquisition aims to strengthen Genius Sports' capabilities in reaching and engaging sports fans, building upon previous partnerships and product launches like FANHub. The move signifies Genius Sports' commitment to pioneering innovation in sports advertising and fan engagement.

feed.title: Genius Sports strikes expanded official data, trading and BetVision partnership with Hard Rock Bet Sportsbook
feed.summary: Genius Sports has announced an expanded partnership with Hard Rock Bet Sportsbook, encompassing official data, trading, and its BetVision product. This collaboration aims to enhance the sports betting experience for Hard Rock Bet users by leveraging Genius Sports' comprehensive suite of services. The deal further solidifies Genius Sports' position as a key provider of sports data and technology solutions in the betting industry.

feed.title: Is Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) Potentially Undervalued?
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) saw a significant share price rise and is currently trading at yearly-high levels. Despite this, a valuation model suggests the stock is still undervalued at $11.37 compared to an intrinsic value of $16.13, offering a potential buying opportunity. The company has a bright future outlook with expected revenue growth of 63% over the next couple of years, making it an attractive prospect for investors.

feed.title: Genius Sports Stock (GENI): Growing Investor Confidence
feed.summary: Genius Sports (GENI) has been added to the Russell 3000 Index, boosting its visibility among institutional investors. The company reported strong Q1 2025 results with 20% revenue growth and a 188% surge in adjusted EBITDA, alongside a reduced net loss and a new $100 million share buyback program. These developments indicate growing investor confidence and potential for continued growth in the sports data and technology sector.

feed.title: NCAA and Genius Sports expand partnership through 2032
feed.summary: The NCAA and Genius Sports have announced an expansion of their partnership, extending it through 2032. This collaboration solidifies their commitment to continued work together. The announcement was made on April 25, 2025.

feed.title: Genius Sports Limited's (NYSE:GENI) high institutional ownership speaks for itself as stock continues to impress, up 13% over last week
feed.summary: Genius Sports Limited (NYSE:GENI) has significant institutional ownership, with 60% of shares held by institutions, including 9.6% by hedge funds. This high level of institutional investment is seen as a positive sign, indicating analysts' interest in the stock and contributing to a 13% stock increase over the last week and a 48% one-year return. Insiders own 12% of the company, and the general public holds 19%, highlighting a diverse ownership structure where no single shareholder has significant control.

feed.title: ESPN Makes Deal with Genius Sport To Add Data to Hoops Telecasts
feed.summary: ESPN has secured a long-term agreement with Genius Sports Ltd. to integrate data-driven storytelling into its broadcasts of NBA, WNBA, and NCAA basketball games. This partnership will leverage Genius Sports' exclusive NCAA data and player-tracking insights to enhance telecasts and fan experiences, building on previous collaborations like the NBA Marvel Arena of Heroes broadcast. The deal aims to unlock next-generation fan engagement through augmented reality and advanced statistical analysis.

feed.title: Genius Sports launches GeniusIQ to accelerate the AI revolution in global sport
feed.summary: Genius Sports has launched GeniusIQ, a new initiative aimed at accelerating the AI revolution within global sports. This move highlights the company's commitment to advancing sports tracking technology beyond traditional methods like stopwatches, incorporating artificial intelligence into its offerings.

feed.title: Apax Partners sells remaining shares in Genius Sports - Finance - iGB
feed.summary: Apax Partners has sold its remaining shares in Genius Sports, fully monetizing its equity interest in the data, technology, and broadcast company. This marks the conclusion of a successful partnership that began in 2018, with Genius Sports CEO Mark Locke expressing gratitude for Apax's support. The news comes as Genius Sports increases its financial forecast for the current full year, expecting revenue of $500m and adjusted EBITDA of $82m.

feed.title: Genius Sports names new chair to replace David Levy
feed.summary: Genius Sports has appointed Kenneth Kay as its new chair, replacing David Levy, who will remain with the company as a strategic advisor. Additionally, Claire Valoti has joined the Board of Directors as an independent director. These changes aim to support Genius Sports' continued growth and advancements in sports data.

feed.title: Genius Sports Negotiating to Extend UK Soccer Data Rights
feed.summary: Genius Sports is in negotiations to extend its exclusive sports betting and player tracking data rights for English and Scottish soccer leagues until 2029. The current deal with Football DataCo Ltd., which commercializes data for the English Premier League, English Football League, and Scottish Professional Football League, is set to expire after the 2024-25 season. Genius Sports has held these rights since 2019, and a previous extension in 2023 also added player tracking technology to EFL Championship matches.
